data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/y8G11KP4qNY2251ufNezKF92EAR.jpg","id":30959,"title":"Kwaidan","original_title":"怪談","overview":"Taking its title from an archaic Japanese word meaning \"ghost story,\" this anthology adapts four folk tales. A penniless samurai marries for money with tragic results. A man stranded in a blizzard is saved by Yuki the Snow Maiden, but his rescue comes at a cost. Blind musician Hoichi is forced to perform for an audience of ghosts. An author relates the story of a samurai who sees another warrior's reflection in his teacup.","poster_path":"/cfcIjq4V8GxtMN6GU3WnufTM9cD.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[27,14,18],"popularity":20.791,"release_date":"1965-01-06","video":false,"vote_average":7.712,"vote_count":363},{"backdrop_path":"/oOM2JzhVBjWyZFHW2iBQQ8A3znY.jpg","id":16672,"title":"Woman in the Dunes","original_title":"砂の女","overview":"A vacationing entomologist suffers extreme physical and psychological trauma after being taken captive by the residents of a poor seaside village and made to live with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.","poster_path":"/rE6vtXBDXy3cjyFmxfsDese0Eo4.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[18,53],"popularity":30.121,"release_date":"1964-02-15","video":false,"vote_average":8.202,"vote_count":423},{"backdrop_path":"/5Ai1K6SnC2bkYQMx4mCxOpUnY65.jpg","id":2153,"title":"The Driver","original_title":"The Driver","overview":"The Driver specializes in driving getaway cars for robberies. He promises pardons to a gang if they help to convict him in a set-up robbery. Otsu waits for him, yet he has come not for her but to challenge the leader of the region's finest school of fencing. To prove his valor and skill, he walks deliberately into ambushes set up by the school's followers. While Otsu waits, Akemi also seeks him, expressing her desires directly. Meanwhile, Takezo is observed by Sasaki Kojiro, a brilliant young fighter, confident he can dethrone Takezo. After leaving Kyoto in triumph, Takezo declares his love for Otsu, but in a way that dishonors her and shames him. Once again, he leaves alone.","poster_path":"/acAQj3UdBDE3waSFtcNMPK69y7p.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[18,28,12],"popularity":12.289,"release_date":"1955-07-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.2,"vote_count":108},{"backdrop_path":"/4u8XR1ULW6c31l7QRgDZOsrUSra.jpg","id":76804,"title":"The Cat and the Canary","original_title":"The Cat and the Canary","overview":"Rich old Cyrus West's relatives are waiting for him to die so they can inherit. But he stipulates that his will be read 20 years after his death. On the appointed day his expectant heirs arrive at his brooding mansion. The will is read and it turns out that Annabelle West, the only heir with his name left, inherits, if she is deemed sane. If she isn't, the money and some diamonds go to someone else, whose name is in a sealed envelope. Before he can reveal the identity of her successor to Annabelle, Mr. Crosby, the lawyer, disappears. The first in a series of mysterious events, some of which point to Annabelle in fact being unstable.","poster_path":"/obXtEtHmncAtak6IFFpaWR3DQbS.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[27,35,9648],"popularity":8.366,"release_date":"1927-09-09","video":false,"vote_average":6.821,"vote_count":70},{"backdrop_path":"/pz3Wt5GfgCxYH4YozGESr88ZNQl.jpg","id":28261,"title":"Mad Love","original_title":"Mad Love","overview":"An insane surgeon's obsession with an actress leads him to replace her wounded pianist husband's hands with the hands of a knife murderer--hands which still have the urge to throw knives.","poster_path":"/lDD8pKd6jSrFLV3RvE0eDGGGxR0.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[27,10749],"popularity":15.196,"release_date":"1935-07-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":106},{"backdrop_path":"/wVPh9Oxv8e1IzgTYohlPlWqSWlu.jpg","id":351981,"title":"Bear Story","original_title":"Historia de un oso","overview":"An old bear goes out every day to a busy street corner. His neglected, sharp-tongued wife is involved in a secret affair with Li, one of Wang’s employees. A timid man, Li reluctantly keeps the gun his lover has bought to kill her husband. But Wang is watching their every move. He bribes patrol officer Zhang to murder the illicit couple. It seems like a perfect plan: the affair will come to a cruel, bloody but satisfying end or so he thinks. The equally wicked Zhang has an agenda of his own. As the plot twists, more blood will flow, and ever greater violence will erupt.","poster_path":"/zqIjReP7BAx3OqKayy7vwIQ1Kqv.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"zh","genre_ids":[35,18,53],"popularity":7.815,"release_date":"2009-12-11","video":false,"vote_average":4.881,"vote_count":66},{"backdrop_path":"/luPyx8j6pwIxaGzvWNSsUYGqdV0.jpg","id":139,"title":"Mifune","original_title":"Mifunes sidste sang","overview":"Kresten, newly wed, is on the threshold of a great career success in his father-in-law´s company. But when the death of his own father takes him back to his poverty-stricken childhood home, far out in the country, his career plans fall apart. For one thing he has to deal with his loveable, backward brother, who is now all alone; for another, he meets a stunning woman who comes to the farm as a housekeeper, in disguise of her real profession as a call-girl.","poster_path":"/962ZZDr4FV3L46ZnurqIaZveL60.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"da","genre_ids":[18,35,10749],"popularity":10.935,"release_date":"1999-03-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":60},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":147684,"title":"Pirate TV","original_title":"Télé gaucho","overview":"It all began when camcorders replaced cameras. Making TV programs then became within everyone's reach. Jean-Lou, Yasmina, Victor, Clara, Adonis, and the others didn't only want to create their own television channel, they above all wanted to make a revolution. Thus Télé Gaucho was born, as anarchic and provocative as the main channels were conformist and reactionary. Five years of mayhem, brutal pirate TV demonstrations, drunken parties, and thwarted love.. And that was my idyllic interlude.","poster_path":"/gGRJjg8YlccKb2aMGe3Bu28UflF.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":5.817,"release_date":"2012-12-10","video":false,"vote_average":5.389,"vote_count":54},{"backdrop_path":"/fmPfRSDkdegZ6HHN9yKkHCPwMLQ.jpg","id":55890,"title":"Bereavement","original_title":"Bereavement","overview":"In 1989, six year old Martin Bristoll was kidnapped from his backyard swing in Minersville Pennsylvania. Graham Sutter, a psychotic recluse, kept Martin imprisoned on his derelict pig farm, forcing him to witness and participate in unspeakable horrors. Chosen at random, his victim's screams were drowned out by the rural countryside. For five years, Martin's whereabouts have remained a mystery, until 17 year old Allison Miller comes to live with her Uncle, Jonathan. While exploring her new surroundings, Allison discovers things aren't quite right at the farmhouse down the road. Her curiosity disturbs a hornet's nest of evil and despair that once torn open, can never be closed.","poster_path":"/5Zd0NzvT3x8EhuE5lYMJz5ShcH1.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[80,27],"popularity":21.904,"release_date":"2010-07-16","video":false,"vote_average":5.253,"vote_count":172}],"total_pages":2,"total_results":40}
